title: Legal OS
description:
* Set up all tech on which Legal OS raised ‚Ç¨2 million seed round.
* Set up recruiting process and executed ahead of the seed round.
* Product had zero downtime during my time at Legal OS.
* Set up single-click deployment and migration infrastructure.

title: Crunchr Planning
description:
* Done dozens of user interviews as part of launching a new product.
* Performed **1:1's** with 2 developers to have a healthy team.
* Developed as well because of small team (3).

title: Crunchr Preference
description:
* Moved unmanaged team to **outcome-driven development**.
* Performed **1:1's** with 2 different developers than above.
* Developed as well here, again because of small team (3).

title: Pieter Pot
description:
* Onboarded 3rd party owned development processes into internal development team.
* Main focus was the mobile app, but I worked on all the technical components of the company (backend, website, deposit management system).

title: StockAlarm
description:
* Wore many hats; Fullstack development to customer support.
* Identified key strategic goals to work towards such as expending outside of the US.
* Implemented the technology necessary to achieve goals focus on scalability.
* Worked on high-load low-latency infrastructure

title: Code.nl
description: * Helped to create endpoints using serverless tech for smooth user experiences on web-shops hosted through the Shopify platform.

title: Producter
description:
It's hard to have a single-source-of truth for Product Teams that doesn't grow to a mess. I set out to fix that.

‚ö∞Ô∏è I didn't care deeply enough about the product to put in the energy required.

title: Who is Playing?
description:
Why not **listen** to who is playing instead of read up on it? Makes picking a party for the evening much easier.

‚ö∞Ô∏è Shutdown because SoundCloud closed it's streaming API.

title: MixMerger
description:
Using the fact that songs appear in multiple mixes, you can create infinite mixes by merging where they play the same songs.

‚ö∞Ô∏è Shutdown because I over-engineered the Fourier Transformations to detect overlapping songs. If I would pick this up again I would first mechanical-turk the tool.

title: Transcendance
description:
VR allows you to truly be immersed with music. I created a prototype, released on [the Oculus forums](https://forums.oculusvr.com/community/discussion/6000/transcendance-a-musical-experience), which got picked up by [one of the main VR youtubers](https://youtu.be/ziFX6t-878Q?t=102) back in 2013.

ü¶∏ Since I was a student never intended to take it further, but the positive reactions made me consider this a success!
